select sl.*,s.name as signature_name,t.name as template_name,rl.platform_name from send_log sl left join receive_log rl on sl.api_log_id = rl.api_log_id left join signature s on sl.signature = s.code left join template t on sl.template = t.code
1 = 1
AND sl.mobile LIKE concat('%',#{params.mobile},'%')
AND s.name LIKE concat('%',#{params.signatureName},'%')
AND t.name LIKE concat('%',#{params.templateName},'%')
AND rl.platform_name LIKE concat('%',#{params.platformName},'%')
and sl.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
and sl.create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
ORDER BY sl.create_time DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%c.%e' ) AS date, COUNT( * ) AS count, SUM(status) as success FROM send_log
1 = 1
and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
and create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(sl.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS date, COUNT( * ) AS count, SUM(sl.status) as success FROM send_log sl left join signature s on sl.signature = s.code
1 = 1
and sl.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
and sl.create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
and sl.config_platform = #{params.configPlatform}
AND s.name LIKE concat('%',#{params.signatureName},'%')
GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT config_name as name, COUNT( * ) AS count , SUM( STATUS ) AS value FROM send_log
config_id != 404
and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
and create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
GROUP BY config_name ORDER BY config_name ASC

SELECT COUNT( * ) AS count, SUM( sl.STATUS ) AS success, MAX( s.NAME ) AS signature_name FROM send_log sl LEFT JOIN receive_log rl ON sl.api_log_id = rl.api_log_id LEFT JOIN signature s ON sl.signature = s.CODE WHERE rl.business = #{params.business}
